title: Vatos Remote Control Car
description: Vatos Toys via Amazon offers the Vatos Remote Control Car for $49.99. Coupon code "F2JE5N9O" cuts it to $24.99. With free shipping, that's a $2 drop from two weeks ago and the lowest price we could find. It features a 164-foot range, 9 mph top speed, 15 minute playing time on full charge, and 180-minute charge time. Deal ends January 10.

title: Crest Toothpaste at Walgreens
description: For its Balance Reward members, Walgreens offers a selection of Crest toothpaste from $2.99. (Not a member? It's free to join.) Clip the $2 off coupon to drop starting prices to 99 cents. Opt for in-store pickup to avoid the $5.99 shipping fee. That's $2 under what you'd pay at other retail stores. Deal ends January 27.

title: Dillard's Permanently-Reduced Items
description: Dillard's takes an extra 50% off permanently-reduced items during its New Year's Day Clearance Event. (Prices are as marked.) That's tied with our Black Friday week mention as the best extra percent-off discount we've seen from Dillard's. Shipping starts at $8.50. Choose from items such as apparel, lingerie, handbags, shoes, and home goods.

title: Steve Madden Solid Classic Sport Backpack
description: Nordstrom Rack offers the Steve Madden Solid Classic Sport Backpack in Olive for $15.75 plus $7.95 for shipping. That's the lowest price we could find by $16. It measures 17" x 11" x 5" and features dual, adjustable padded shoulder straps, front zip storage pocket, front zip around pocket, top zip stash pocket, and earphone cord eyelet.

title: Firestone Lifetime Wheel Alignment
description: Today only, Firestone Auto Care offers its Lifetime Wheel Alignment for $119.99 via this printable coupon. That's tied with last year's mention, $70 off, and the best deal we've seen for this service. This entitles you to a standard alignment service, as well as free wheel alignments for as long as you own your vehicle.

title: 2 Something Strong Bags
description:
Something Strong via Flagship offers a selection of Something Strong backpacks, messenger bags, duffel bags, and laptop bags for $89.99. Better yet, add two to your cart and apply coupon code "BAGS" to cut the price to $50. With free shipping, that's the lowest price we could find for any Something Strong bag by at least $30. Deal ends January 2.

Note: This coupon applies to bags priced at $99 but drops the final price for two to $99.

title: Philosophy Gift Sets at Macy's
description:
Macy's takes 50% off a selection of Philosophy Gift Sets, with prices starting from $12.50. Plus, all orders receive free shipping. A couple of best bets:
  • Philosophy 4-Piece Fresh Cream Gift Set for $16 (pictured, low by $12)
  • Philosophy 3-Piece Let Every Adventure Uplift You Gift Set for $30 (low by $24)
Note: Nordstrom and Bon-Ton are also taking 50% off select Philosophy sets, including some sets not available at Macy's. Nordstrom has free shipping and Bon-Ton offers free shipping via coupon code "BEAUTY".

title: Unlocked Nokia 3310 3G Cell Phone Bundle
description:
Best Buy offers the Unlocked Nokia 3310 3G Cell Phone in several colors (Charcoal pictured) bundled with a Cricket Wireless Universal SIM Card Activation Kit and a Refill Card from $46.98 with free shipping via the steps below. That's the lowest price we could find by $53. This GSM phone features 2.4" 320x240 LCD display, 16MB memory, Bluetooth, 2-megapixel camera, FM radio, and microSD slot. To get this deal:
  1. Add the Unlocked Nokia 3310 3G Cell Phone to your cart for $54.99
  2. select "add to offer" for the Cricket Wireless Universal SIM Card Activation Kit for $9.99
  3. select "add to offer" for the refill card of your choice
  4. click "add to cart" at the bottom of the page
  5. at final checkout, the price will drop to a starting price of $46.98, depending on the card selected

title: Steve Madden Sale and Clearance
description:
Steve Madden cuts an extra 40% off its sale and clearance styles via coupon code "CHEERS". Shipping adds a flat $7.95. Alternatively, for orders under $20, bag free shipping via coupon code "SHIP" (Codes don't stack, but it yields a stronger discount on these orders.) Some exclusions may apply. Deal ends December 2.

See all Steve Madden Coupons.

title: Chase Sapphire Preferred® Card
Alex Toys Shimmer and Shine Knot-a-Pillow
description:

description: Sam's Club offers members the Kershaw FreeFall Folding Knife for $9.98 with free shipping. (Non-members pay a $1 surcharge. description: SanDisk takes an extra 10% off select items via coupon code "AfterXmas" during its After Christmas Clearance Sale. Plus, the same code nets free shipping. Save on memory cards, flash drives, earbuds, and MP3 players.

description: At Verizon, you can sign up for the Verizon Fios Just Stream It Bundle for $49.99 per month. This bundle includes Fios TV Local bundled with Fios 50/50 Mbps Internet and your choice of one premium movie channel for three months. Also, the standard setup charge is waived, a $99.99 value. description: Fry's offers the Everything Ernest: 3 Feature Films on DVD Disc for $3.99 with free shipping. That's the lowest price we could find by $6. It includes Ernest Goes to Camp, Ernest Goes to Jail, and Ernest Scared Stupid.

description: Walmart offers the Klutz LEGO Make Your Own Movie Kit for $17.18. (Amazon charges Choose in-store pickup to dodge the $5.99 shipping fee. title: Acer 34" Curved WQHD Gaming Display
description: Ending today, Newegg offers the Acer Predator X34 34" Curved 21:9 3440x1440 WQHD IPS LED-Backlit Nvidia G-Sync Gaming Monitor, model no. UM.CX1AA.A01, for $999.99. Coupon code "EMCBCDR38" drops the price to $899.99. With free shipping, that's $100 under our mention from March and the lowest price we've seen. (It's a current low by $100.) It features a 3440x1440 (1440p) native resolution, 21:9 aspect ratio, Nvidia G-Sync technology (which provides overclocked refresh rates up to 100Hz), 4ms response time, LED backlight, two 7-watt DTS Sound speakers, and HDMI and DisplayPort inputs.

description:

description: Sound of Tri State via eBay offers the Kenwood 2-DIN Bluetooth 6.2" Touchscreen Receiver for $189.99 with free shipping. (Electronics Express via Newegg charges the same.) title: Armor All 10pc Ultimate Holiday Gift Pack
description: Walmart offers the Armor All 10-Piece Ultimate Holiday Gift Pack for $19.88. Choose in-store pickup to dodge the $5.99 shipping fee. description: Allen Edmonds offers its Allen Edmonds Men's Boulevard Cap Toe Dress Shoes in several colors (Walnut pictured) for $197.50 with free shipping. That's $198 off and the lowest price we could find. They're available in sizes 7 to 15.

description:

description:

description: Amazon offers the Gaiam Evolve Balance Board for $40.49 with free shipping. That's the lowest price we could find by $40. It purports to engage muscles in the back, core, legs, and ankles while standing.

The Harmony Smart Control works on more than 225,000 devices and features Bluetooth 3.0, a universal remote with 50 favorite channel icons, and support for Amazon's Alexa voice control. The hub also works with the Harmony app for iOS or Android.

Scalzi's "The Collapsing Empire" Kindle eBook

title: JCPenney New Year's Sale
description:
JCPenney discounts a large selection of items during its New Year's Sale, including up to 80% off clearance items. Plus, coupon code "32FORYOU" takes an extra 20% off most orders with no minimum purchase required or an extra 30% off orders of $100 or more. (It only takes 15% off select categories.) Alternatively, get an extra $10 off orders of $25 or more via coupon code "COOLSALE". Shipping adds $8.95, but orders of $99 or more bag free shipping. (In-store pickup is available for many items for $3.95, or free for most orders over $25.) Deal ends January 1.

See all JCPenney Coupons.

title: Google Home Mini w/ $25 Walmart GC
description: For in-store pickup only, Walmart offers the Google Home Mini in Chalk or Charcoal for $29. Plus, link your Walmart account to Google and you'll receive a $25 Walmart Credit for a future order via Google Express. Assuming you use the credit, that's tied with our expired mention from three days ago as the lowest price we've seen. (It's the best deal now by $25.) The coupon will be automatically issued when your Walmart account is linked to your Google account. Limit two coupons per household. Coupon expires January 31.

title: Marriott Rewards® Premier Credit Card
Playmobil City Zoo
description:
Amazon offers Prime members the Playmobil City Zoo for $14.39 with free shipping. That's the lowest price we could find by $4. This 91-piece set includes several figures.

Note: It's temporarily out of stock but still available to purchase for this price. (It's expected to be back in stock on January 4.)

title: Go Pet Club 47" Kitten Tree
description:
Amazon offers the Go Pet Club 47" Kitten Tree for $29.99. Clip the 10% off coupon to cut that to $26.99. With free shipping, that's the lowest price we could find by $8. It measures 29" x 23" x 46.75"and is covered in faux fur.

Update: Note that this item is temporarily out of stock, but can still be ordered at this price for delivery when available.

title: Insulated 16oz. Thermos w/ Tea Strainer
description: EFO-S via Amazon offers its EFOSHM Insulated Stainless Steel 16-oz. Thermos with Removable Tea Strainer in Black for $16.99. Clip the 40% off coupon to drop the price to $10.19. Plus, Prime members receive free shipping. That's $7 under our January mention and the lowest price we've seen. This double-wall, vacuum-insulated thermos is BPA-free.

title: 9 Ways to Eat Healthy on a Budget in 2018
description: Want to eat healthier and save more money in the new year? Contrary to popular belief, those two things aren't mutually exclusive. We rounded up a few tips to help you get started on your 2018 resolutions.

title: 7 New Year's Resolutions That Will Save You Money
description: Most sites will tell you to quit smoking or stop buying Starbucks every day if you want to save money in the new year. Here are seven different New Year's resolutions for you to consider, all of which will save you money in 2018.

title: Seatore Lemon Squeezer
description: HomeBay via Amazon offers the Seatore Lemon Squeezer for $16.99. Coupon code "KLS4A8CG" cuts it to $13.60. Plus, Prime members bag free shipping. It features a dual gear mechanism and stainless steel construction. Deal ends January 2.

title: Dell Member Purchase Program
description: Dell Home, via its Member Purchase Program, offers discounts of up to 30% off select laptops, desktops, tablets, electronics, and accessories. Plus, free shipping applies to most items.
